about_the_game:
Ren Xia is an instant action role-playing game in which you play as a young warrior in the ancient East to participate in the tournament, in order to win the world's unremitting efforts.

This is a very difficult game, you need to make the right moves at the right time to defuse the enemy's various offensives, and constantly counterattack. See the move, to attack the attack!

Game Features

Martial arts story experience with Chinese characteristics!

Exciting and difficult action battles!

A variety of weapons attack and defense collision!

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: Violence or Gore
